dialogue.text: Welcome to the bridge between you and the most important parts of you.
I am me.
And I am joined here today by Moyo.
Say hello, Moyo.
Sometimes, when Moyo opens her mouth, everything becomes broken.
It’s quite similar to the way you break each time you stare down at your hands.
Think back to the first thing you ever held with those unfortunate appendages of yours.
Do you wish to hold it all again?
Or would you rather spend your time here?
With us?
The children of the clockwork.
Cogs in the machine.
The frogs stuck in your throat.
We are here under special guidance and even more special supervision. A fantastic show for you and you alone.
Free from interruptions or interference. Blessed by your presence and an outpouring of delectable retinal fluid.
Three fluid ounces poured over ice is all you need to see the sunset.
Tell me. Are you happy where you stand now?
Happy to hear my voice?
Or is there something else you’d rather hear instead?
Something closer to comfort than the two of us.
Closer to Heaven than you’ve ever been before.
I embody the flesh of Onan and recall the words of Judah but do not speak them to you as my tongue twists every time I try.
The blood of the patriarch flows through my veins and into my dick, ballooning like an animal at a child’s birthday party.
But today is no birthday at all. It is a day of a reckoning and a day of rejoicing.
We rejoice because we are able to support the weight of ourselves when the world will not, but are unable to support the weight of the world when our bodies grow too old.
I am in the prime of my life.
A young, sexually active man with abs of steel and an impressive cock- presented before a longer version of a girl I {b}LOATHE{/b} and her mutilated counterpart.
They are like superheroes, the two of them. Just instead of rescuing passersby, they are here to rescue me.
But from what?
{b}A whale?{/b}
Or something more sinister than that??????????
I suppose you’re wondering, “What does it all mean?”
But as you harken back to prior experiences you may or may not have had, you’ll come to find that the pieces don’t quite fit.
Or is it more that they do?
But that someone with scissors is sneaking into your room at night and cutting them up without asking for your permission.
I pose a simple question of philosophy- one that an intellectual like you should be able to answer even if your wires are currently tangled.
The question is this.
What makes a man a man?
Does a man make a man a man? Or is it up to the man to make man of a man?
Oh man. That's a hard one.
It’s raining outside.
You are watching the water droplets dance down the window as a series of noises assault you from both sides.
On your left, the sound of a stereo’s static screaming- no. {i}Singing{/i} to your senses.
Ssssssssssssssssssssss~
To your right, the repeated clacking of a headboard as it slams against the wall, chipping away at soft white paint you helped spread yourself.
You did it together.
But it is not your headboard that clack-clacks today. It is the headboard of someone else.
Someone else taking the one thing you love as you are forced to sit there and pretend you don’t know it.
Is it easy playing tricks on yourself?
Were you ever able to laugh?
Can you laugh today?
Or do you still pretend it never rains at all?
I love the rain! Am a happy boy! Doodly doodly doo!
Sometimes, sing and dance in it! With the girl! The one from the dream! Dance together!
The one from the dream?
How peculiar.
Attempting to rewrite your past with bits of the future won’t work like you want it to, you know. The lines aren’t meant to cross that way.
All the lines you need are right here.
In front of you.
Behind you.
All you have to do is reach out and grab them.
I grab a line.
So soft! So smooth! So leg!
It’s her good leg too.
Can you tell me how it feels?
I think to myself about how the leg feels.
The skin is as smooth as silk. Nothing like the flesh of the harlequin.
I’m able to make a ring out of my fingers and move up and and and and and and and down against the leg.
I feel young again.
It is so very small. So small that I could fit at least half of it inside of my mouth if I removed it and diced it into tiny cubes.
The body the leg is attached to smiles at me, happy to feel the fingers of the chosen one as the rest look on in envy.
Onan did nothing wrong.
And if anyone slipped on the semen in the hut, it was not Onan’s fault.
Sometimes, we just want to forget.
And sometimes, forgetting requires a large amount of baby juice.
So yeah, that is how the leg makes me feel.
It’s good!
It is, isn’t it?
There are many legs attached to many bodies inside of this building- each one ready and willing to accept your gift.
The one to your left has never been touched.
The one to your right has been touched more times than you can imagine.
Whichever you prefer is the one you can have.
We assembled them all for you.
Think of them as presents...{i}Offerings.{/i}
Gifts to whet your appetite. To make you hunger.
We’re all just cuts of meat, aren’t we? Red on the inside and the out. And you are a growing boy.
You need red meat to become strong. To become the {i}you{/i} you want to be.
To become a man.
Pussies to you are like roaches to Moyo. They keep you moving when the world stops.
And something always {i}has{/i} to be moving somewhere.
If not here, then where?
Is this tree the only one that’s stopped growing? Or are there more trees elsewhere?
Don’t know! Haven’t learned yet!
Then I suppose it wouldn’t hurt to give you a little hint.
The universe is a forest.
We are the soil.
It’s all part of a cycle- just like she told you.
But she only knows so much.
She is a child of circumstance, not time. Not clockwork.
A child you have known and one you will continue to know as her grip on who we are and {i}where{/i} we are weakens.
Imagine the look on her face when she finally lets go.
Imagine the look on her face when she finally slips.
I don’t want to be erased. I want to stay here with you.
Even though you’re disgusting, I’ll let you cum inside of me. I am incredibly sex deprived and it’s become extremely frustrating as of late.
I don’t want you to cum inside of me at all. I despise children and you’d be a terrible father.
Please keep in mind that whichever one you choose will disappear once we are done here today.
Their existence, unlike ours, is temporary. We will continue-
And they will rejoin the cycle.
whatigottadotobreakthecyclecauseidontlikethesoundofthat
Unfortunately, there is no way to break the cycle. Or at least no way we’ve ever heard of before.
But there is a way you can help. And all you have to do is keep doing exactly what you’ve been doing this whole time.
Just...in a slightly different way. But that’s okay, because that’s why we were brought here. That’s what the purpose of today’s special broadcast is.
ihopeitsnotalivebroadcastcauseidontwantmyparentstoseemyadultwienerlolitssobignow
Silly, Sensei. Your parents died a long, {i}long{/i} time ago.
ohnohow
Diabetes is the simple answer.
darnit
Don’t get {i}too{/i} upset now.
You won’t be able to fill the bucket.
That’s right.
The real reason we’re here today is because we need your help.
And because, unfortunately, the past several guests we’ve had on our show have lacked the necessary...{i}components{/i} required to fill the bucket.
How come I have to do it? I don’t even like buckets.
We’re not sure. We’re just doing what we’re told, after all. But we’ve been given permission to help you by any means necessary.
If the ornaments behind you will not help in accomplishing this, I could get in touch with our producers for more...specialty items.
Specialty?
Corpses...Animals...Perhaps even a watermelon as you {i}do{/i} have a history with them.
I like the way the seeds feel when they slide down my urethra.
Then I suppose I’ll put in the word for a fresh watermelon right away. All {i}you{/i} have to do is just bring yourself close to completion using it and-
Wait, no.
No?
May I ask what the problem is?
Don’t wanna have sex with a watermelon.
Wanna bang Long Maya.
{i}Long{/i} Maya?
You. Like Maya, but longer. Stretchy limbs.
Me?
Are you sure that’s what you want?
Moyo’s unique anatomical structure has given her vaginal cavity a corkscrew pattern that our producers swear by. You’d have a much easier time enjoying yourself with her.
But then who would hold the bucket?
You’re gross.
That’s not the line.
I’m a different entity. I have my own lines.
If you want me, then come.
But I’ll be making adjustments to your neck.
Long Maya twists my neck around so I can’t see her and I get kind of mad because she is pretty even if she is very long.
I put my wiener inside of her meat pocket and it feels really good.
I move it around and that also feels really good.
She doesn’t make much noise so she probably doesn’t feel that good but I do so it’s okay.
I move it around a little more and clench my teeth so I don’t accidentally make a baby with her.
This will be my first time cumming in a bucket, but probably not my last since I know many girls who would like to collect my juices in a container like that.
Wish they were here right now. All I have are different kinds of Mayas and doing sex to Maya might make her brain explode.
So {i}this{/i} is how it feels.
I’ve always been curious. But I’ve been so busy with work that I’ve never gotten to do any experimenting.
If I didn’t know how this ends, I might even start developing {i}feelings{/i} for you. And that would go against so many rules.
I don't even want to think about what HR would say.
Who do you...work for?!
I’m technically a freelancer, but have been receiving regular employment from a special someone beginning with the letter H.
Damn it Haruka! Don’t you have enough baristas?!
While you are making sex to my vagina, would you mind answering another question or two?
I’ll do...whatever you want...Long Maya!
Then, could you start by describing how it feels inside of me?
It’s hot...and slimy...and I feel...
I feel something crawling around....
That’s probably just Moyo’s dinner.
I never learned how pockets work and have taken to storing the roaches she eats inside of myself as it keeps them warm and Moyo likes the taste.
Wish I...knew that...before sex!
I didn’t realize it was going to be a problem. I’ve never done something like this before.
It feels pretty good when you slam against the depths of me like that.
I think I feel teeth all the way at the end of Long Maya’s vaginal canal.
They keep trying to nibble at the head of my penis each time I start getting a little too crazy, but I’m too skilled to be defeated by guerrilla tactics like that.
Mm...yes...
I can barely feel the roaches anymore...
Each time I push, I feel a little-
Wait, never mind. I’m going to ejaculate and forgot what I was going to say.
Bring me...the bucket!
Moyo, return to your chair. Bad things happen when you leave your chair.
And we don’t want our special guest spilling the fruits of our labors all over the cathedral floor.
The tiny teeth of Long Maya’s cunt chomp at my pp and remind me to pull out before the baby happens.
Her arms extend and lift me up, placing me in front of the bucket and the girl with the corkscrew vagina.
I worry about not being able to cum outside of Long Maya, but the way this other one contorts herself is enough to keep me hard.
Hold it steady, Moyo. We need to catch as much as we can. We have no idea how long we’ll have to wait for another serving.
In the end, God slew Onan.
It became too displeased.
There is nothing more sacrilegious than the liquid waste of an unrealized follower.
There is nothing more sacrilegious than a sheep without a shepherd.
Little by little, liquid waste spills from my manhood.
It’s a lot more than usual.
The way it drips down the side of the bucket reminds of me of ketchup.
But I’m probably just hungry.
I’m so proud of you.
Not just because you filled the bucket...
But because your insistence on using me instead of the dolls we provided may allow us to receive a refund.
Thanks to you, we may finally be able to repair the leak in the roof.
We only have one bucket, so we’ve been forced to just let it all drip.
Thank you, Long Maya. Hope we can do it again some day.
I hope so as well. But I do insist you give Moyo a try next time.
I’m sure my slimy, roach-filled insides are nothing compared to the vortex that is her-
Ah...
MMGRGLRGRGRGLLGLRLGRGRGRGGGGRLLLLLLLLLL!
Oh dear...
You wouldn’t happen to be up for another round, would you?
Sensei?
Sensei?...
Have you come to pray?...
His glory knows no sleep, but it’s so early in the day.
Sensei?
It’s all a perfect circle.
One that fits us all.
But something wants to break it.
What it is, I can’t recall.
Bucket, bucket.
Wonderful bucket.
How much of my love can you hold?
{i}Yasu’s affection has increased to [yasu_love]!{/i}
